channel.title: How to change what is says when you login a server ( For newbys :P )
channel.description:
Ok I know alot of you know how to do this already so dont flame im mainly posting this for a few friends that are just starting to make there Server or leeching off of other servers ok i will get on to the guide now
First off in your server files you will see something that says ( Client.java ) open that up
Then push (ctrl ) and hold ( F ) down a little bar will pop up type in ( welcome ) or what ever the words say when you login your server...
This is what it should look like where your going to change the name of on the login... [URL=http://img22.imageshack.us/i/capturexo.png/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/68/capturexo.png[/img][/URL]
Ok now just put your server name where you see the other person server name you most likly leeched off of and save and compile it
One last thing make sure you dont erase the ( " " ) on the sides of where your write what ever you want to say or else you will get errors
